Package Services

Class ConquestMap

java.lang.Object
Services.ConquestMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ConquestMap extends Object implements Serializable
Handles read, write operatons on ConquestMap.
Version:
3.0.0
Author:
Sumit Sharma, Muhammad Adnan Asad, Pranaykumar Chauhan, Darshansinh Dilipsinh Devda, Dhruvkumar Parmar, Dhruv Patel

  • Method Details

    • readMapContent

      public void readMapContent(List<String> p_fileContent, Map p_map, GameState p_gameState)
      Processes the map content extracted from the file and updates the map and game state.
      Parameters:
      p_fileContent - List of lines from the file
      p_map - Map object to update with processed data
      p_gameState - GameState to update with the processed map

    • retrieveMetaData

      public List<String> retrieveMetaData(List<String> p_fileLines, String p_switchParameter)
      Provides the essential lines obtained from the map file.
      Parameters:
      p_fileLines - All Lines in the map document
      p_switchParameter - Type of lines needed : country, continent, borders
      Returns:
      List required set of lines

    • analyzeContinentsMetaData

      public List<Continent> analyzeContinentsMetaData(List<String> p_continentList)
      In the 'analyzeContinentsMetaData' method, the extracted continent data from the map file is parsed.
      Parameters:
      p_continentList - includes continent data in list from map file
      Returns:
      List of processed continent meta data

    • analyzeCountriesMetaData

      public List<Country> analyzeCountriesMetaData(List<String> p_countriesList, List<Continent> p_continentList)
      In the 'analyzeCountriesMetaData' method, the extracted country and border data from the map file are analyzed.
      Parameters:
      p_countriesList - includes country data in list from map file.
      p_continentList - includes Continents data in list from map file.
      Returns:
      List of processed country meta data.

    • analyzeBorderMetaData

      public List<Country> analyzeBorderMetaData(List<Country> p_countriesList, List<String> p_countryLines)
      Establishes connections between the Country Objects and their corresponding neighbors.
      Parameters:
      p_countriesList - Total Country Objects Initialized
      p_countryLines - Country Lines
      Returns:
      List Updated Country Objects

    • linkCountryContinents

      public List<Continent> linkCountryContinents(List<Country> p_countries, List<Continent> p_continents)
      Associates countries with their respective continents and assigns them within the continent object.
      Parameters:
      p_countries - Total Country Objects
      p_continents - Total Continent Objects
      Returns:
      List of updated continents

    • getContinentByName

      public Continent getContinentByName(List<Continent> p_continentList, String p_continentName)
      Filters continent based on continent name.
      Parameters:
      p_continentList - list of continents from which filtering has to be done
      p_continentName - name of the continent which has to be matched
      Returns:
      filtered continent based on name

      Parameters:
      p_countrytList - list of countries from which filtering has to be done
      p_countryName - name of the country which has to be matched
      Returns:
      filtered country based on name

    • writeCountryAndBoarderMetaData

      public void writeCountryAndBoarderMetaData(GameState p_gameState, FileWriter p_writer) throws IOException
      Retrieves country and border data from the game state and further processes it for writing to a file using a file writer.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameState Object
      p_writer - Writer object for file
      Throws:
      IOException - handles I/0

    • writeContinentMetadata

      public void writeContinentMetadata(GameState p_gameState, FileWriter p_writer) throws IOException
      Obtains continent data from the game state and proceeds to write it to a file.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameState
      p_writer - Writer Object for file
      Throws:
      IOException - handles I/O

      Writes the domination Map changes to File.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - current gamestate
      l_writer - file writer
      l_mapFormat - Map Format
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception
